title: Sketchbook
content:
Here is a page from my sketchbook that I redid on the computer. It is called "Favorite Letter"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130629011743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CIMG3831_5756.JPG)

Here is what I came up with on the computer.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130629011743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/favorite_4852.jpg)

The page from my sketchbook didn't really have any form or purpose, so I thought what better shape to give it than the shape of the favorite letter itself.
author: jftorres

comments.content: My apologies, but apparently my computer image was too large to post. As soon as I get home I will post a smaller version.
